INSERT INTO BOARD( BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TYPE ,CATEGORY_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL ,1 ,? ,? ,? ,? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO ,REF_BNO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL ,SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL ,? ,? ,? )
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,USER_ID,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS ='Y'

UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
